file_content.text: This world is unnatural. Like the Force is... hollow.
I felt it, too.
The Force flows through every living thing, Theron. Even you.
My power is limited here, but I will do what I can to shield you and your companions from the worst effects of the void.
Taking us down.
Greetings, Empress. It has been far too long.
Where is Jarak?
Waiting for you in his lab. Do you remember the way?
I'll keep an eye on the shuttle. Call if you need me.
Scans detect only one structure emitting signs of life.
Wait here.
The Emperor corrupted the Force on Ziost and drove everyone mad with bloodlust. But here I barely sense the Force at all.
It's different from Ziost.
When the Emperor made everyone on Ziost go mad and kill each other, I felt a strange heat in the air. But this place is... cold.
It's different from Ziost.
Vaylin survived here when she was only a child. You can handle a little uneasiness.
Don't go soft on me now.
The effects will be stronger on the surface. The absence of the Force could drive us mad.
If we can feel the effects already, what happens when we touch down?
The world is unsettling, but Vaylin's down there somewhere. We have to find her.
We can handle this.
Hopefully before she finds a way to break Valkorion's hold.
Ignoring what we feel would be a mistake. It will only grow stronger as we approach the surface.
